item.title: 3 large pot holes on Church Road (main road end). Just after entering the road and before the bus stop, 10th February
item.description:
This has been reported before. Two flat tyres later as you have no choice but to go over these sometimes due to parked cars and two way traffic.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 3 Boleyn Cottages Church Road, Swindon Village
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pothole approx 2ft wide abour 100m from Brockworth junction, 8th February
item.description:
The pothole is not too deep at the moment and should be repaired now to avoid it becoming a dangerous hazard.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): The Bratch Hucclecote Lane, Churchdown
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Chasm of a pothole,(one of many) Robert Burns Avenue, 8th February
item.description:
A "chasm" of a pothole that is an accident risk to cyclists and motorcyclists and a damage risk to cars is getting bigger by the day. This is adjacent to the speed hump between Colesbourne Road and the entrance to St Mark's Junior School. This is just one of many that are opening up yet again along the whole length of Robert Burns Avenue. There are better road surfaces in many third world countries caused purely by a lack of maintenance and sub-standard previous repairs.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 65 Robert Burns Avenue, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple potholes St Paul's Lane Cheltenham, 7th February
item.description:
Multiple potholes on St Paul's Lane Cheltenham, in the stretch between St Paul's Road and the side entrance to the university. Needs an assessment and patching/ resurfacing as necessary.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): The Mews 29-31 Saint Paul's Lane, Cheltenham

item.title: Missing bollard, 7th February
item.description:
Safety bollard has been hot by a car and removed. Leaving an island jutting out into the road which is unmarked. Serious risk for cyclists and cars at night and poor light.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Pittville Circus Road, Cheltenham
